description.0: Legend has it that this longsword was once used by a wandering knight in the distant past.

0.0: DMG dealt by Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst is increased by <cryo>16%</cryo>. When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, its CRIT Rate will be increased by <cryo>2%</cryo>. When an Elemental Burst hits an opponent, its CRIT Rate will be increased by <cryo>2%</cryo>. Both of these effects last 10s separately, have 4 max stacks, and can be triggered once every 0.1s.
